document.full_text: the toronto maple leafs bagged two quick goals in the third period and held on for a crucial 4-3 comeback win over the buffalo sabres on saturday to improve their chances at making the playoffs.
document.title: leafs rally to edge sabres, keep playoff hope alive
lines_and_colors: the toronto maple leafs bagged two quick goals in the third period and held on for a crucial 4-3 comeback win over the buffalo sabres on saturday to improve their chances at making the playoffs.
